transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Alisha. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I want to dispute a charge on my statement.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I have a hearing impairment, can you speak clearly?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'll do my best to assist you. Please let me know if you need anything repeated.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
